Html:
It seems that I can't download the msi installer ... I keep getting stuck in an endless "download" loop ... 

 

Does somebody else has this problem ?

Hi,

I can download http://mvvmlight.codeplex.com/downloads/get/524082 and http://mvvmlight.codeplex.com/downloads/get/476364 fine using Chrome. Which browser are you using?

Someone else on Twitter reported the same issue (or was it you?)

Thanks
Laurent

It wasn't me :)

 

But I tried Chrome, IE, Firefox on 3 different machines (located different physical places)

And none of them succeeded in downloading the msi. 

But I can download the source ... that's the strange part ... (but don't have the tools currently here to build the installer ... so I would love to download the msi )
